      â–‘   â–‘  â–‘  â–‘      â–‘  â–‘   â–‘      â–‘     â–‘  â–‘             â–‘        â–‘  â–‘

====================================================================
 MODULE 1: SPACETIME_OS.h â€” "Where x, y, z, t become one."
====================================================================

  ğŸ“Œ STRUCT:
      struct SpacetimeEvent {
          float x, y, z;     // â† Space coords
          float t;           // â† Local time â€” warped by mass & speed
          MetricTensor g;    // â† Curvature field â€” gravity = geometry
      };

  ğŸ“Œ FUNCTIONS:
      float get_local_time(Observer obs) â†’ Relativity-adjusted clock.
      void warp_spacetime(Mass m, Position p) â†’ Bend reality. Use wisely.
      Wormhole? â†’ âŒ // â€œExotic matter required â€” v2.0 feature.â€

====================================================================
 MODULE 2: QUANTUM_FIELD.h â€” "Particles are just excited fields."
====================================================================

  ğŸ“Œ CLASS:
      class QuantumField {
          excite(energy) â†’ returns Particle*;
          string name; // e.g., "ElectronField", "PhotonField"
      };

      class Particle {
          collapse_on_observe() â†’ Random outcome. Heisenberg says hi.
          entangle(Particle& other) â†’ Spooky action at a distance.
      };

  ğŸ“Œ QUOTE:
      â€œIf you think you understand quantum mechanics, you donâ€™t.â€
      â€” Richard Feynman (Senior Quantum Dev, Nobel â€™65)

====================================================================
 MODULE 3: PHYSICS_ENGINE.h â€” "F = ma. Also, energy never dies."
====================================================================

  ğŸ“Œ CORE LOOP:
      while (universe.is_running()) {
          apply_forces(objects);
          integrate_motion(deltaTime);
          enforce_conservation_laws();
          render_reality(); // optional ğŸ˜‰
      }

  ğŸ“Œ LAWS:
      #define CONSERVE_ENERGY     true
      #define CONSERVE_MOMENTUM   true
      #define ENTROPY_ONLY_INCREASE true  // âš ï¸ no undo()

====================================================================
 MODULE 4: ENTROPY_MANAGER.h â€” "The universe forgets. You can't."
====================================================================

  ğŸ“Œ STATUS:
      Entropy: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘ 42% (and rising)

  ğŸ“Œ WARNING:
      â€œYou canâ€™t unscramble an egg. Or reverse time. Or delete heat.â€
      â€” 2nd Law of Thermodynamics (immutable system policy)

====================================================================
 MODULE 5: HUMAN_PLUGIN.dll â€” "Experimental conscious agents"
====================================================================

  ğŸ“Œ FEATURES:
      - NeuralNet v1.0 (biological)
      - CreativityModule (unpredictable output)
      - MoralityLayer (optional, buggy)
      - CuriosityDriver â†’ causes â€œWhy?â€ spam â†’ leads to this doc.

  ğŸ“Œ KNOWN ISSUES:
      - FreeWill vs Determinism â†’ unresolved race condition.
      - Emotions â†’ non-logical overrides. Handle with care.

====================================================================

  â–“â–ˆ   â–“â–ˆâ–ˆâ–’â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–’â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–‘â–’â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–’â–’â–‘â–“â–ˆâ–’â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–“â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–‘â–’â–ˆâ–ˆâ–‘   â–“â–ˆâ–ˆâ–‘â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€â–’
  â–’â–’   â–“â–’â–ˆâ–‘â–‘ â–’â–‘â–“  â–‘â–‘â–“  â–’ â–’â–“â–’ â–’ â–‘ â–’ â–‘â–‘â–’â–‘â–’â–‘â–“  â–‘ â–’â–‘   â–’ â–’  â–‘â–’   â–’

      ./spawn_universe \
        --name "MyVerse" \
        --gravity 0 \
        --time reversible \
        --dimensions 5 \
        --enable_ai_gods true

      â€œThis universe is provided as-is. No warranty. No refunds.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Docusaurus blogging features are powered by the blog plugin.
item.content:encoded:
Docusaurus blogging features are powered by the blog plugin.

Here are a few tips you might find useful.

Simply add Markdown files (or folders) to the blog directory.

Regular blog authors can be added to authors.yml.

The blog post date can be extracted from filenames, such as:

  • 2019-05-30-welcome.md
  • 2019-05-30-welcome/index.md

A blog post folder can be convenient to co-locate blog post images:

The blog supports tags as well!

And if you don't want a blog: just delete this directory, and use blog: false in your Docusaurus config.

item.title: MDX Blog Post
item.description: Blog posts support Docusaurus Markdown features, such as MDX.
item.content:encoded:
Blog posts support Docusaurus Markdown features, such as MDX.

tip

Use the power of React to create interactive blog posts.

For example, use JSX to create an interactive button:

<button onClick={() => alert('button clicked!')}>Click me!</button>

item.title: Long Blog Post
item.description: This is the summary of a very long blog post,
item.content:encoded:
This is the summary of a very long blog post,

Use a <!-- truncate --> comment to limit blog post size in the list view.
